body:
We use AlgorithmDesc when launching convolutions as well.

Do I have to pass an AlgorithmDesc with the correct scratch requirement on
pain of fatal error?  Or is it ignored?  How do we propose this works?

On Wed, Jul 25, 2018 at 2:02 PM Tim Shen <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Yes, and sorry about that. :)
>
> After that, do you plan to use cuDNN's
> cudnnGetConvolutionForwardWorkspaceSize() to populate the scratch size in
> AlgorithmDesc? So that the scratch size is always valid, not like 0
> sometimes depending on the DNN library.
